node.detail_zh: 患者居住在屯門海景花園 1 座，是第 #60 宗個案患者的母親，以及第 #57 宗個案患者的岳母。患者於 2 月 14 日有輕微流鼻水徵狀。她於 2 月 15 日跌倒骨折到屯門醫院骨科病房求診，翌日接受髖關節手術，留院期間沒有發燒。醫生其後知道她的家人確診後，為她做了病毒測試， 2 月 19 日檢測出對病毒呈陽性反應並確診。女患者的丈夫新年前頻繁回東莞樟木頭與朋友聚會，新年期間有咳嗽， 1 月初曾經看過幾次醫生，女兒和女婿則在1 月 27 日（初三）和1 月 29 日（初五）與外父會面。
node.detail_en: The patient lives in Block 1 of Seaview Garden, Tuen Mun and is the mother of patient no. 60 and the mother-in-law of patient no. 57. She developed a runny nose on Feb 14. She sought treatment from Tuen Mun Hospital after a fall on Feb 15 and underwent an orthopaedic surgery the following day. During hospitalisation, fever was not detected. After patients no. 57 and no. 60 were diagnosed, a test was conducted on this patient for the coronavirus and came back positive on Feb 19. Before the Lunar New Year, the patient's husband visited Zhangmutou of Dongguan in China frequently for meet-ups with friends. He had coughs during the holiday. He also consulted doctors several times in early Jan. He met with patients no. 57 and no. 60 on Jan 27 and 29.
node.classification_zh: 可能本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.description_zh: 群組首名確診者為巴馬丹拿集團（P&T Group）工程師，及後其同事、妻子及岳父岳母均證實確診。
groups.description_en: The first confirmed case is an engineer of P&T Group, whose colleagues, wife and parents-in-law were all diagnosed positive to the coronavirus.

node.location_en: Orthopaedic ward of Tuen Mun Hospital
node.remarks_zh: 於 2 月 15 日跌倒骨折求診，翌日接受髖關節手術
node.remarks_en: The patient sought treatment after a fall on Feb 15 and underwent an orthopaedic surgery the following day.

node.remarks_zh: 與丈夫（第 66 宗患者）同住；2 月 14 日有輕微流鼻水
node.remarks_en: She lives with her husband (patient no. 66) and had a runny nose on Feb 14.

node.location_zh: 三聖街 5 號海天花園酒家
node.location_en: Hoi Tin Garden Restaurant, 5 Sam Shing Street

node.location_zh: 青霞里 6 號康和護老中心
node.location_en: Cornwall Elderly's Home, 6 Tsing Ha Lane
